```
apiVersion: security.istio.io/v1beta1
kind: AuthorizationPolicy
metadata:
  name: prometheus-scraper
  namespace: istio-system   ![1](assets/1.png)
spec:
  selector:                 ![2](assets/2.png)
    matchLabels:
      has-metrics: "true"
  action: ALLOW             ![3](assets/3.png)
  rules:
  - from:                   ![4](assets/4.png)
    - source:
        namespace: ["prometheus"]
    to:
    - operation:            ![5](assets/5.png)
        methods: [ "GET" ]
        paths: ["/metrics/*"]
```
